void DColorSpace::getHSVFromRGB ( D_uint8  R,
D_uint8  G,
D_uint8  B,
float *  H,
float *  S,
float *  V 
) [inline, static]

Computes the H,S,V values corresponding to the R,G,B values.

h in [0,360), s and v in [0,1]. Note: if s==0 then h is undefined (but this function sets it to 0 for convenience).

Referenced by convertRGBImageToHSV(), and DDynamicProgramming::piecewiseLinearWarpDImage().

void DColorSpace::getRGBFromHSV ( float  H,
float  S,
float  V,
D_uint8 *  R,
D_uint8 *  G,
D_uint8 *  B 
) [inline, static]

Computes the R,G,B values for H,S,V.

0<=H<360, S and V should be 0 to 1 (inclusive). Note: If S is zero, then Hue is undefined (doesn't matter) and this is a grayscale value equal to V.

Referenced by convertHSVImageToRGB().
